title: Ear With Hearing Aid Medium Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Hearing Aid Ear Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: An ear with a hearing aid device, representing hearing, auditory assistance, or sound. This specific emoji depicts a medium-dark skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the ear with a hearing aid emoji features a detailed rendering of an ear in a medium-dark skin tone, complete with subtle contours and realistic lighting. The hearing aid itself is depicted with a smooth, unobtrusive design, showcasing Apple‚Äôs commitment to accessibility and inclusive design. This emoji effectively conveys themes of communication, auditory perception, and the use of assistive technology, fostering understanding and empathy.
